name: SoundDefinition.SoundType
description: Represents the type of sound that the SoundDefinition.Sound object represents.

methods.name: values
methods.description: Returns an array containing the constants of this enum class, in the order they are declared.

methods.name: valueOf
exceptions: IllegalArgumentException - if this enum class has no constant with the specified name
methods.description: Returns the enum constant of this class with the specified name. The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an enum constant in this class. (Extraneous whitespace characters are not permitted.)

enum_constants.name: SOUND
enum_constants.description: Identifies a "normal" sound. In a "normal" sound, the name is considered a file name, which the game attempts to load from the currently loaded resource packs.

enum_constants.name: EVENT
enum_constants.description: Identifies a "redirect" sound. In a "redirect" sound, the name of the sound is treated as the name of another SoundEvent , which will be queried. Processing is then deferred to that specific sound event, recursively as needed.
